editorialSummary.text: Trendy hotel with loft-like rooms, plus fine dining, a lobby cafe & 24-hour concierges.

originalText.text:
We had a great stay at The Mercer!
The rooms were clean and comfortable, and there were nice touches like fresh fruit.
The service was friendly and professional and all requests were accommodated without fuss.
It‚Äôs also in a great location!
Would def recommend.

originalText.text: I can't say enough about this hotel! From the moment we walked in, we knew we were in for a special experience. The hotel has a sleek, modern design. Our suite was amazing and had a spacious and clean interior. The hotel staff were very friendly and attentive, and went out of their way to make our stay unforgettable. The Mercer truly exceeded our expectations and we can't wait to return!

text.text: I can't say enough about this hotel! From the moment we walked in, we knew we were in for a special experience. The hotel has a sleek, modern design. Our suite was amazing and had a spacious and clean interior. The hotel staff were very friendly and attentive, and went out of their way to make our stay unforgettable. The Mercer truly exceeded our expectations and we can't wait to return!

originalText.text: What a wonderful hotel! I felt right at home when I arrived. Everyone from the bell men, to the front desk staff, to the sales team were so warm and welcoming. The hotel is also in such a great location. If you want to be in the city, but not in the craziness of times square or midtown, this was perfect. The rooms are lovely and luxurious. Very easy to get around the city as well, as there are subways only a few feet away, and rideshare is easily accessible from the hotel's front entrance. 10/10, would definitely recommend.

text.text: What a wonderful hotel! I felt right at home when I arrived. Everyone from the bell men, to the front desk staff, to the sales team were so warm and welcoming. The hotel is also in such a great location. If you want to be in the city, but not in the craziness of times square or midtown, this was perfect. The rooms are lovely and luxurious. Very easy to get around the city as well, as there are subways only a few feet away, and rideshare is easily accessible from the hotel's front entrance. 10/10, would definitely recommend.

originalText.text:
If the secret wasn't out before, it is now. Stunning property tucked away in the middle of it all.

From the moment you walk in and feel the escape from the street, a comfortable refuge awaits. The staff is impeccable, and caters to your every need. I was astounded at the level of care I received from literally every single one of them.

The food. Oh the food. Having a restaurant IN the hotel that marvels places the locals direct you to is so good.

And the comfort of the rooms makes you feel like you are in your new home away from home.

Kudos to Michel and the entire staff.

I'll be back. Soon.
